verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when הֵחֵ֣ל <WH2490> began הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> And it came to pass when men לָרֹ֖ב <WH7231> to multiply עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the earth וּבָנ֖וֹת <WH1323> and daughters יֻלְּד֥וּ <WH3205> were born לָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> saw בְנֵי־ <WH1121> That the sons הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> the daughters הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men כִּ֥י <WH3588> for טֹבֹ֖ת <WH2896> [were] fair הֵ֑נָּה <WH2007> that they וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> and they took לָהֶם֙ נָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> them wives מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they בָּחָֽרוּ׃ <WH977> of all which they chose

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יָד֨וֹן <WH1777> strive רוּחִ֤י <WH7307> My spirit בָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> with man לְעֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> shall not always בְּשַׁגַּ֖ם <WH1571> for that he also ה֣וּא <WH1931> he בָשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> is flesh וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become יָמָ֔יו <WH3117> yet his days מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> shall be an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> and twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

הַנְּפִלִ֞ים <WH5303> There were giants הָי֣וּ <WH1961> were on בָאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> in the earth בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> in those days הָהֵם֒ <WH1992> [children] to them the same וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> and also אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> and also after כֵ֗ן <WH3651> that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when יָבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> came in בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the sons הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> unto the daughters הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of men וְיָלְד֖וּ <WH3205> and they bare לָהֶ֑ם הֵ֧מָּה <WH1992> Those הַגִּבֹּרִ֛ים <WH1368> [became] mighty men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מֵעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> which [were] of old אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> men הַשֵּֽׁם׃ <WH8034> of renown פ

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And GOD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רַבָּ֛ה <WH7227> [was] great רָעַ֥ת <WH7451> that the wickedness הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> every יֵ֙צֶר֙ <WH3336> and [that] every imagination מַחְשְׁבֹ֣ת <WH4284> of the thoughts לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> of his heart רַ֥ק <WH7535> [was] only רַ֖ע <WH7451> evil כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> continually

וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <WH5162> And it repented יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> that he had made אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאָדָ֖ם <WH120> man בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> on the earth וַיִּתְעַצֵּ֖ב <WH6087> and it grieved אֶל־ <WH413> him at לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> his heart

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶמְחֶ֨ה <WH4229> I will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָ֤ם <WH120> man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom בָּרָ֙אתִי֙ <WH1254> whom I have created מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> of the earth מֵֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> both man עַד־ <WH5704> and בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> beast עַד־ <WH5704> against רֶ֖מֶשׂ <WH7431> and the creeping thing וְעַד־ <WH5704> and to ע֣וֹף <WH5775> and the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of the air כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִחַ֖מְתִּי <WH5162> for it repenteth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עֲשִׂיתִֽם׃ <WH6213> me that I have made
וְנֹ֕חַ <WH5146> But Noah מָ֥צָא <WH4672> found חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <WH8435> These [are] the generations נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> of Noah נֹ֗חַ <WH5146> Noah אִ֥ישׁ <WH582> another צַדִּ֛יק <WH6662> was a just תָּמִ֥ים <WH8549> [and] perfect הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become בְּדֹֽרֹתָ֑יו <WH1755> in his generations אֶת־ <WH854> with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> with God הִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־ <WH1980> walked נֹֽחַ׃ <WH5146> [and] Noah

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> begat נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> And Noah שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> sons אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֖ם <WH8035> Shem אֶת־ <WH853> חָ֥ם <WH2526> Ham וְאֶת־ <WH853> יָֽפֶת׃ <WH3315> and Japheth

וַתִּשָּׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> also was corrupt הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> The earth לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the earth חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> with violence

וַיַּ֧רְא <WH7200> looked אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold נִשְׁחָ֑תָה <WH7843> and behold it was corrupt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִשְׁחִ֧ית <WH7843> had corrupted כָּל־ <WH3605> for all בָּשָׂ֛ר <WH1320> for all flesh אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> his way עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> upon the earth ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God לְנֹ֗חַ <WH5146> unto Noah קֵ֤ץ <WH7093> The end כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> of all flesh בָּ֣א <WH935> is come לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before me כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> is filled with הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> for the earth חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> violence מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> through them וְהִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am about מַשְׁחִיתָ֖ם <WH7843> and behold I will destroy אֶת־ <WH854> them with הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> Make לְךָ֙ תֵּבַ֣ת <WH8392> thee an ark עֲצֵי־ <WH6086> wood גֹ֔פֶר <WH1613> of gopher קִנִּ֖ים <WH7064> rooms תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֶת־ <WH854> in הַתֵּבָ֑ה <WH8392> the ark וְכָֽפַרְתָּ֥ <WH3722> and shalt pitch אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> מִבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> it within וּמִח֖וּץ <WH2351> and without בַּכֹּֽפֶר׃ <WH3724> with pitch

וְזֶ֕ה <WH2088> This אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is how תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> And this [is the fashion] which thou shalt make אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> שְׁלֹ֧שׁ <WH7969> [shall be] three מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits אֹ֚רֶךְ <WH753> it [of] The length הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> of the ark חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> of it fifty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits רָחְבָּ֔הּ <WH7341> the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> of it thirty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits קוֹמָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6967> and the height

צֹ֣הַר ׀ <WH6672> A window תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou make לַתֵּבָ֗ה <WH8392> to the ark וְאֶל־ <WH413> to אַמָּה֙ <WH520> and in a cubit תְּכַלֶ֣נָּה <WH3615> shalt thou finish מִלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> it above וּפֶ֥תַח <WH6607> and the door הַתֵּבָ֖ה <WH8392> of the ark בְּצִדָּ֣הּ <WH6654> in the side thereof תָּשִׂ֑ים <WH7760> shalt thou set תַּחְתִּיִּ֛ם <WH8482> [with] lower שְׁנִיִּ֥ם <WH8145> second וּשְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <WH7992> and third תַּֽעֲשֶֽׂהָ׃ <WH6213> [stories] shalt thou make

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֨יא <WH935> even I do bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּבּ֥וּל <WH3999> a flood מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> of waters עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> to destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> [and] every thing בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> all flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בּוֹ֙ ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> wherein [is] the breath חַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> of life מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> from under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> heaven כֹּ֥ל <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> that [is] in the earth יִגְוָֽע׃ <WH1478> shall die

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <WH6965> But with thee will I establish אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> my covenant אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> and you וּבָאתָ֙ <WH935> and thou shalt come אֶל־ <WH413> into הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> the ark אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> thou וּבָנֶ֛יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons וְאִשְׁתְּךָ֥ <WH802> and thy wife וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH802> wives בָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons' אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> and of

וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> every הָ֠חַי <WH2416> And of every living thing מִֽכָּל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֞ר <WH1320> of all flesh שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> two מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> of every תָּבִ֥יא <WH935> of every [sort] shalt thou bring אֶל־ <WH413> to הַתֵּבָ֖ה <WH8392> into the ark לְהַחֲיֹ֣ת <WH2421> to keep [them] alive אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> with thee they shall be male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <WH5347> and female יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

מֵהָע֣וֹף <WH5775> Of fowls לְמִינֵ֗הוּ <WH4327> after their kind וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and of cattle לְמִינָ֔הּ <WH4327> after their kind מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> of every רֶ֥מֶשׂ <WH7431> of every creeping thing הָֽאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> of the earth לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <WH4327> after his kind שְׁנַ֧יִם <WH8147> two מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> of every יָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> of every [sort] shall come אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you לְהַֽחֲיֽוֹת׃ <WH2421> unto thee to keep [them] alive

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you קַח־ <WH3947> And take לְךָ֗ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all מַֽאֲכָל֙ <WH3978> thou unto thee of all food אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> that is eaten וְאָסַפְתָּ֖ <WH622> and thou shalt gather אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֛ וְלָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> [it] to thee and it shall be for food

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> Thus did נֹ֑חַ <WH5146> Noah כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> according to all that God כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> him so did ס
